moves.1. e4 e5 2. Nf3 Qf6: Horrible. 2... N-QB3 or 2... P-K3 make much more sense than using the Q.
moves.5. Bxf7+: Obviously 5... KxB??? loses at once to 6 N-N5 ch!!! forking the royals.
moves.5... Ke7: Now the King becomes a target.
moves.6. Re1: Seizing the half-open file with tempo.
moves.7... Kxf7: As good or bad as anything else.
moves.8. d4: Looking to bring a new piece intro the attack, and gains another tempo.
moves.8... Qf6: Removing a flight square for the K.
moves.10. Qd3+: A fourth piece joins the hunt.
moves.11... Kxg4: He goes down fighting to the end.
